data.title: Chauncey Billups Playoff Series - Full Stats
meta_keywords: Chauncey Billups nba stats playoffs series
data.meta_description: Chauncey Billups numbers for all the statistic categories of the Playoff series he appeared in, with the averages he recorded and data about his playoff rivals and how many series he played, won and lost.
data.text:
Chauncey Billups numbers for all the statistic categories of the Playoff series he appeared in, with the averages he recorded and data about his playoff rivals and how many series he played, won and lost.

Show Stats: by Year (Basic) / by Year (Full) / by Points / by Rebounds / by Assists / by Steals / by Blocks

Chauncey Billups played in 146 games in 12 Playoffs. That includes 28 Playoff series. His team won 17 of those series and lost 11.

more >>

- He did not play in the 1998 Playoffs.

- He did not play in the 1999 Playoffs.

- He did not play in the 2000 Playoffs.

- He did not play in the 2012 Playoffs.

- He did not play in the 2014 Playoffs.
